snippet: A lawmaker appealed to Russia’s top prosecutor on Tuesday to investigate the reasons for Matt Romney’s recent visit to Moscow.
lead_paragraph: A lawmaker appealed to Russia’s top prosecutor on Tuesday to investigate the reasons for Matt Romney’s recent visit to Moscow.

headline.seo: Russia: Lawmaker Asks for Inquiry on Matt Romney’s Visit
headline.main: Russia: Lawmaker Asks for Inquiry on Romney Son’s Visit
headline.print_headline: Russia: Lawmaker Asks for Inquiry on Romney Son’s Visit
